A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I felt completely cheated after this movie.  No I am not a fanboy who only wants the original cast.  But at least give them a solid sendoff\, they are what made Star Wars after all.  I don't think I have ever been this disappointed in a film.  Plot was choppy and lacked depth\,  killed off big characters new and old with ease\, too much Disney/Marvel style jokes.  Visually it was great and the score was fantastic\,  the only saving grace.
